title: Playback
description: Settings relating to playback and supported codec and media types.

children.title: Codec Support
children.description: Enable or disable Direct Play support for certain codecs

children.title: AV1
children.description: ** EXPERIMENTAL** Support Direct Play of AV1 content if this Roku device supports it.

children.title: MPEG-2
children.description: Support Direct Play of MPEG-2 content (e.g., Live TV). This will prevent transcoding of MPEG-2 content, but uses significantly more bandwidth.

children.title: MPEG-4
children.description: Support Direct Play of MPEG-4 content. This may need to be disabled for playback of DIVX encoded video files.

children.title: Profile Level Support
children.description: Attempt Direct Play of potentially unsupported profile levels

children.title: H.264
children.description: Attempt Direct Play for H.264 media with unsupported profile levels before falling back to transcoding if it fails.

children.title: HEVC
children.description: Attempt Direct Play for HEVC media with unsupported profile levels before falling back to trancoding if it fails.

children.title: Cinema Mode
children.description: Cinema Mode brings the theater experience straight to your living room with the ability to play custom intros before the main feature.

children.title: Text Subtitles Only
children.description: Only display text subtitles to minimize transcoding.

title: User Interface
description: Settings relating to how the application looks.

children.title: General
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of the Home screen and the program in general.

children.title: Hide Clock
children.description: Hides all clocks in Jellyfin. Jellyfin will need to be closed and reopened for change to take effect.

children.title: Max Days Next Up
children.description: Set the maximum amount of days a show should stay in the 'Next Up' list without watching it.

children.title: Show What's New Popup
children.description: Show What's New popup when Jellyfin is updated to a new version.

children.title: Use Splashscreen as Home Background
children.description: Use generated splashscreen image as Jellyfin's home background. Jellyfin will need to be closed and reopened for change to take effect.

children.title: Use Splashscreen as Screensaver
children.description: Use generated splashscreen image as Jellyfin's screensaver background. Jellyfin will need to be closed and reopened for change to take effect.

children.title: Libraries
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of Library pages.

children.title: General
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of pages in all Libraries.

children.title: Grid View Settings
children.description: Settings that apply when Grid views are enabled.

children.title: Item Count
children.description: Show item count in the library and index of selected item.

children.title: Item Titles
children.description: Select when to show titles.

children.title: Hide Taglines
children.description: Hides tagline text on details pages.

children.title: Return to Top
children.description: Use the replay button to slowly animate to the first item in the folder. (If disabled, the folder will reset to the first item immediately).

children.title: Movies
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of pages in Movie Libraries.

children.title: Default View
children.description: Default view for Movie Libraries.

children.title: TV Shows
children.description: Settings relating to the appearance of pages in TV Libraries.

children.title: Blur Unwatched Episodes
children.description: If enabled, images of unwatched episodes will be blurred.

children.title: Skip Details for Single Seasons
children.description: If enabled, selecting a TV series with only one season will go straight to the episode list rather than the show details and season list.

children.title: Disable Community Rating for Episodes
children.description: If enabled, the star and community rating for episodes of a TV show will be removed. This is to prevent spoilers of an upcoming good/bad episode.
